compatibility.notes: The Eurosym license is designed to be permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions.

key_requirements: Acknowledge the original authors in product documentation if the software is used in a product.
Mark altered versions clearly to avoid misrepresentation.
license.name: Eurosym
obligations: The origin of the software must not be misrepresented.
Altered source versions must be plainly marked as such.
Names of the authors or copyright holders cannot be used for advertising without permission.
Source code of altered versions must be made available upon redistribution.
The license notice must not be removed or altered from any source distribution.
